original_text: That is why I had to send Timothy to come to you. I could not wait to hear news about you any longer. I wanted to know whether you still trusted Christ. I was afraid that Satan had deceived you. If he had made you turn away from Christ, our work among you would have had no results.
korean_text: 이러므로 나도 참다 못하여 너희 믿음을 알기 위하여 그를 보내었노니 이는 혹 시험하는 자가 너희를 시험하여 우리 수고를 헛되게 할까 함이니

sentences.original_text: That is why I had to send Timothy
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 디모데를 보내야 했던 이유입니다

sentences.original_text: I could not wait to hear news about you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 소식을 듣는 것을 더 이상 기다릴 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: I was afraid that Satan had deceived you
If he had made you turn away from Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그가 너희를 그리스도에게서 떠나게 했다면
